snippet.title: SubOptimal Gameplay. Horror point&click short game
snippet.description:
#horrogame #pixelart #pointandclick 
Dace Games, 2024.
https://thrive.itch.io/suboptimal
Suboptimal is a small horror Point & Click adventure game where you must escape the submarine you are commanding, one way or another...
In the depths of the ocean, your submarine has been plunged into darkness as the power systems failed. One by one, your crew have fallen mysteriously ill, and are now resting in the sick bay. Strange whispers echoed through the metal hull and the cold grip of the ocean outside seems to tighten.
